snippet: The American printing and software company has agreed to be sold for $3.6 billion to a group led by Apex Technology of China and PAG Asia Capital.
abstract: Printing and software company Lexmark agrees to be sold to consortium led by Apex Technology of China and PAG Asia Capital for $3.6 billion.
lead_paragraph: The American printing and software company has agreed to be sold for $3.6 billion to a group led by Apex Technology of China and PAG Asia Capital.

headline.main: Chinese Consortium Reaches Deal to Buy Lexmark
headline.print_headline: Chinese Consortium in Deal for Lexmark
